description: These item bonus info texts are displayed in the FilterBlade Customizer tierList hoverBoxes. The texts are separate for section, baseType and (optional) unique name. The structure is: section (e.g. Uniques, Currency, ...) -> 'items' -> baseType (e.g. Simple Robe) -> property 1: 'text' (string to be displayed for the entire baseType), property 2: 'items' -> uniqueName (e.g. Tabula Rasa) -> 'text' (string to be displayed just for this one specific unique).

Tabula Rasa.text: Tabula Rasa is excluded. It is an exception due to its always 6 white linked sockets.

The Squire.text: Detected via a special rule (using the 3 white sockets)! The oppressor can be safely hidden in the unique tierlist.

Starforge.text: Detected via a special rule that overrides general tiering

Voidforge.text: Detected via a special rule that overrides general tiering

Kingmaker.text: Does not drop naturally! Created with a vendor recipe (siege axe + heartbreaker + fusing)!
